name: Eternal Hunger
description: Dark Transformation's duration is increased by <dynamic>5 sec - 15 sec</dynamic>.

name: Chilled Resilience
description: Icebound Fortitude's cooldown is reduced by <dynamic>15.0 sec - 60 sec</dynamic>.

name: Spirit Drain
description: Successfully interrupting an enemy with Mind Freeze grants <dynamic>5 - 20</dynamic> Runic Power.

name: Reinforced Shell
description: Anti-Magic Zone's radius is increased by 15% and the duration is increased by <dynamic>1.0 sec - 8 sec</dynamic>.

name: Accelerated Cold
description: Empower Rune Weapon recharges 10% faster and grants <dynamic>5.0% - 15%</dynamic> additional Haste.

name: Withering Plague
description: Heart Strike deals <dynamic>10.0% - 35%</dynamic> increased damage to enemies infected by Blood Plague.

name: Eradicating Blow
description: Obliterate increases the damage of your next Frost Strike by <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic>, stacks up to 2 times.

name: Blood Bond
description: Rune Tap heals you and your party for <dynamic>5.0% - 15%</dynamic> of your maximum health.

name: Hardened Bones
description: While Lichborne is active the damage you take is reduced by <dynamic>5.0% - 15%</dynamic>.

name: Embrace Death
description: Sudden Doom increases the damage of your next Death Coil by <dynamic>40.0% - 100%</dynamic>.

name: Biting Cold
description: Remorseless Winter deals <dynamic>2.0% - 9%</dynamic> increased damage to enemies it hits, stacking up to 10 times.

name: Unending Grip
description: Death Grip slows enemy movement speed by <dynamic>25.0% - 60%</dynamic> for 5 sec.

name: Insatiable Appetite
description: Death Strike's minimum healing is increased by <dynamic>1.0% - 8%</dynamic>.

name: Meat Shield
description: Increases the duration of Dancing Rune Weapon by 3 sec and while active, your parries increase your maximum health by <dynamic>1.0% - 8%</dynamic>, stacking up to 2 times for 15 sec.

name: Unleashed Frenzy
description: Frost Strike increases your strength by <dynamic>1.0% - 4.5%</dynamic> for 6 seconds, stacks up to 5 times.

name: Debilitating Malady
description: Blood Boil increases the damage enemies take from your Blood Plague by <dynamic>1.0% - 10%</dynamic> for 6 sec, stacks up to 3 times.

name: Convocation of the Dead
description: When a Festering Wound bursts the cooldown of Apocalypse is reduced by <dynamic>0.5 sec - 3.5 sec</dynamic>.

name: Lingering Plague
description: Scourge Strike extends the duration of your Virulent Plague by <dynamic>0.3 sec - 4.5 sec</dynamic>.

name: Impenetrable Gloom
description: Swarming Mist's damage and dodge chance is increased by <dynamic>5.0% - 30%</dynamic>  for the first 4 sec.

name: Brutal Grasp
description: Abomination Limb deals <dynamic>50.0% - 125%</dynamic> increased damage to enemies it pulls to you.

name: Proliferation
description: Shackle the Unworthy has a <dynamic>2.0% - 10%</dynamic> chance to spread to a nearby enemy each time it deals damage.

name: Withering Ground
description: Death's Due deals <dynamic>15.0% - 50%</dynamic> increased damage.
